h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
h3_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 5
content: The next Blood of the Iron Bull is in Chapter 2, Yellow Wind Ridge. From the first Shrine: Village Entrance \- Sandgate Village, head around to the edge of the cliff on the right (away from the archers on the gate's roof). After two tough mini-boss enemies, you will see a large hill in front of you. Head up it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md', within the main section titled 'Blood of the Iron Bull', specifically from the subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Location 5'.
The content is as follows:
The next Blood of the Iron Bull is in Chapter 2, Yellow Wind Ridge. From the first Shrine: Village Entrance \- Sandgate Village, head around to the edge of the cliff on the right (away from the archers on the gate's roof). After two tough mini-boss enemies, you will see a large hill in front of you. Head up it.
